testcase.classname: Withdraw money on Piggy bank page
testcase.name: Withdraw a valid amount of money on the Piggy bank
testcase.system-out: Given I start the application...............................................passed And I have a vCard..........................................................passed And I insert my "pin code"..................................................passed And I tap the "Login" button...............................................passed When I tap the "PiggyBank" button.........................................passed And I insert a valid amount of money........................................passed And I tap on "Remove" button..............................................passed Then I can see the money removed on the Piggy bank..........................passed
